channel.title: Copy of Exorth release
channel.description:
[b]All information:
Well i was thinking about to make a copy of Exorth because they also did with Dodian/Devolution, only Winten = Dodian released it. Now i used Devolution 7.0 and made it perfect. I added magic require runes, essence minning, alot of npc's on same place that exorth have. Need 60 minning to enter minning guild, and some dungeons. And i added Slots, gambler, casino. Also Exorth have this. And if added thiefing on objects. I added Exorth stalls with same items. It's not fully done like Exorth but you can code more and make it more like Exorth if you want. And it have full premium membership. 60 days countdown. And glory's working now, you see on picture where to recharge.
- Full combat - Full fishing 100% here some spot ids only added 1 spot. 316,320,314,313,312,322,234,
- Full cooking 100% - Full Exorth runecrafting - Full essence guild - Magic requires runes - Almost all skills work. - NO DUPES ANYMORE + FIXED SETITEM DUPE TEST IT YOURSELF.
To do skills: Farming
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/rjpi86.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/30iizqc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/20zpbgp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/nben9y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/fwotg6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/1038s34.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/5d9qpf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2qaraxt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2la3tyv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/opa9mc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/7488/prem6pd6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/24fe076.jpg[/img]
All i want is that people going to use Devolution servers now and stop using delta. Why? because if i look on mopar almost all servers are based on Deltascape i hate that, more different servers are better.
Server download: [url=http://uppit.com/v/JECMFBLU]http://uppit.com/v/JECMFBLU[/url] Client download comming soon.
Credits: - Vayken 20% of coding - Dragonkiller 20% of Coding - Squad = Jennipher11 50% of coding - Devolution for base. 10%[/b]
